title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\ResourceUsageExportConfig\ConsumptionMeteringConfig
name: ConsumptionMeteringConfig
description:
Parameters for controlling consumption metering.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.ResourceUsageExportConfig.ConsumptionMeteringConfig

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.enabled
params.description: Whether to enable consumption metering for this cluster. If enabled, a second BigQuery table will be created to hold resource consumption records.
